title: Beef Stir Fry
instructions: 1. Mix beef with cornstarch. 2. Heat sesame oil in a pan, stir-fry garlic and ginger. 3. Add beef and cook until browned. 4. Add vegetables and sauces, stir-fry for 5 minutes. 5. Serve with rice.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439014

title: Vegetable Curry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pot, sauté onions and ginger. 2. Add potatoes and carrots, cook for 5 minutes. 3. Stir in curry powder, turmeric, and coconut milk. 4. Simmer for 20 minutes, then add spinach and cook until wilted. 5. Season with salt and pepper, serve with rice.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439015

title: Margherita Pizza
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C. 2. Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce. 3. Top with mozzarella and bake for 10-12 minutes. 4. Garnish with fresh basil and drizzle with olive oil before serving.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439016

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: 1. Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. 2. Add croutons, Parmesan, and boiled egg slices. 3. Season with black pepper and serve.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439017

title: Tacos
instructions: 1. Cook beef with onion and garlic until browned. 2. Add taco seasoning and water, simmer for 5 minutes. 3. Fill taco shells with beef mixture and top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439018

title: Fettuccine Alfredo
instructions: 1. Cook fettuccine in salted water. 2. Melt butter in a pan, add cream and simmer for 5 minutes. 3. Stir in Parmesan, then toss with pasta. 4. Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439019

title: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: 1. Dip eggplant slices in beaten eggs, then coat with breadcrumbs. 2. Fry in olive oil until golden. 3. Layer eggplant, tomato sauce, and cheese in a baking dish. 4. Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes, garnish with basil.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439020

title: Chicken Burrito
instructions: 1. Warm tortillas and fill with rice, beans, chicken, salsa, guacamole, cheese, and lettuce. 2. Roll up and serve.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439021

title: Vegetarian Lasagna
instructions: 1. Cook lasagna noodles. 2. Sauté zucchini, eggplant, and garlic in olive oil. 3. Layer noodles, veggies, ricotta, mozzarella, and sauce in a baking dish. 4. Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439022

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: 1. Butter both slices of bread. 2. Place cheese between the bread and grill on both sides until golden brown.
author: 507f1f77bcf86cd799439023
